original_theorem:
If $f$ is differentiable at $\mathbf{X}_0,$ then $f$
is continuous at $\mathbf{X}_0$.
theorem_translation:
```lean4
theorem differentiable_imp_continuous {E F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]
    [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù F] {f : E ‚Üí F} {x‚ÇÄ : E}
    (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x‚ÇÄ) : ContinuousAt f x‚ÇÄ := by
```

‚Ä¢ M is the Euclidean norm of the vector m [def_4].
Therefore, we conclude:
‚Ä¢ |L(X - X‚ÇÄ)| ‚â§ M |X - X‚ÇÄ| [l1].

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_imp_continuous {E F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]
    [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù F] {f : E ‚Üí F} {x‚ÇÄ : E}
    (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x‚ÇÄ) : ContinuousAt f x‚ÇÄ := by
  intro Œµ hŒµ
  rcases hf with ‚ü®L, hL‚ü©
  have : Tendsto (fun x' => f x' - f x‚ÇÄ - L (x' - x‚ÇÄ)) (ùìù x‚ÇÄ) (ùìù 0) := by sorry -- This needs to be proven from hL
  have : Tendsto (fun x' => L (x' - x‚ÇÄ)) (ùìù x‚ÇÄ) (ùìù (L (x‚ÇÄ - x‚ÇÄ))) := by
    apply Continuous.tendsto
    apply L.continuous
  simp at this
  have Ltendsto : Tendsto (fun x' => L (x' - x‚ÇÄ)) (ùìù x‚ÇÄ) (ùìù 0) := by sorry
  have aux : ‚àÄ x, ‚ÄñL x‚Äñ ‚â§ ‚ÄñL‚Äñ * ‚Äñx‚Äñ := by
    intro x
    apply L.le_opNorm
  sorry

attempt_history.verified_code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_imp_continuous {E F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]
    [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù F] {f : E ‚Üí F} {x‚ÇÄ : E}
    (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x‚ÇÄ) : ContinuousAt f x‚ÇÄ := by
  let L := hf.linearMap
  have l1 : ‚ÄñL (x' - x‚ÇÄ)‚Äñ ‚â§ ‚ÄñL‚Äñ * ‚Äñx' - x‚ÇÄ‚Äñ := L.le_opNorm (x' - x‚ÇÄ)
  sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
‚Ä¢ The definition of differentiability states f(X) - f(X‚ÇÄ) = L(X - X‚ÇÄ) + E(X)|X - X‚ÇÄ| [def_2].
‚Ä¢ The term |L(X - X‚ÇÄ)| is bounded by M |X - X‚ÇÄ| [l1].
Therefore, we conclude:
‚Ä¢ |f(X) - f(X‚ÇÄ)| ‚â§ (M + |E(X)|) |X - X‚ÇÄ| [l2].
proof_steps.lean_tactics: sorry  -- skipped due to previous failure

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
‚Ä¢ For all X in a neighborhood of X‚ÇÄ, the inequality |f(X) - f(X‚ÇÄ)| ‚â§ (M + |E(X)|) |X - X‚ÇÄ| holds [l2].
‚Ä¢ The error function satisfies lim_{X ‚Üí X‚ÇÄ} E(X) = 0 [def_3].
Therefore, we conclude:
‚Ä¢ f is continuous at X‚ÇÄ (which is defined as lim_{X ‚Üí X‚ÇÄ} f(X) = f(X‚ÇÄ)). [ts_1]

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_imp_continuous {E F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]
    [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù F] {f : E ‚Üí F} {x‚ÇÄ : E}
